column4: Hello, I need some help sharing an internet connection through an ethernet cable so if someone could help me please, I want to share this connection with a ubuntu computer, I'm using Vista right now. Thanks
im sure vista still has internet connection sharing
ive no experience with vista but with xp all you do is select your 'main' internet connection in control panel and right click it, enable sharing. piece of cake
yes it does, but I tried it with no success, the ubuntu machine said it was connected but I had no internet.
